name: Chomped!
description:
This is Chomped! A game about chomping puppies!

Based on ProperlyPettingPuppies.com, the aim is to Chomp as many puppies before the time runs out!

Hints:

There is a double jump!

If you land on a puppies head, you may have a chance to jump again! This is super important for the big chomps!

If you notice any bugs, please do me a favour and let me know on Giantbomb.com, the username is gerbilsinspace. We don't want any bugs in our chomps! Thanks!

Apologies on not having a web browser version, for some reason it caused a bug which made me fall through the world. Turns out making games is difficult.
